02458   /*! class. QuadList
02459       desc.
02460           "ManualObject" like class to quickly draw rectangles, gradients, sprites and borders.
02461   */
02462   class QuadList : public Ogre::GeneralAllocatedObject
02463   {
02464    
02465    friend class Layer;
02466    
02467    public:
02468     
02469     /*! function. begin
02470         desc.
02471             Clear everything and start again
02472     */
02473     void  begin();
02474     
02475     /*! function. rectangle
02476         desc.
02477             Draw a rectangle sized w,h at x,y
02478     */
02479     void  rectangle(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, const Ogre::ColourValue = Ogre::ColourValue::White);
02480     
02481     /*! function. gradient
02482         desc.
02483             Draw a gradient rectangle sized w,h at x,y
02484     */
02485     void  gradient(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Gradient gradient, const Ogre::ColourValue& colourA = Ogre::ColourValue::White, const Ogre::ColourValue& colourB = Ogre::ColourValue::White);
02486     
02487     /*! function. gradient
02488         desc.
02489             Draw a gradient rectangle sized w,h at x,y
02490     */
02491     void  gradient(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Gradient gradient, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& colourA, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& colourB)
02492     {
02493      this->gradient(x,y,w,h,gradient, webcolour(colourA), webcolour(colourB));
02494     }
02495     
02496     /*! function. sprite
02497         desc.
02498             Draw a sprite sized w,h at x,y
02499     */
02500     void  sprite(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Sprite*);
02501     
02502     /*! function. border
02503         desc.
02504             Draw a border sized w,h at x,y of a thickness
02505     */
02506     void  border(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Ogre::Real thickness, const Ogre::ColourValue& = Ogre::ColourValue::White);
02507     
02508     /*! function. border
02509         desc.
02510             Draw a border sized w,h at x,y of a thickness
02511     */
02512     void  border(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Ogre::Real thickness, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& colour)
02513     {
02514      border(x,y,w,h,thickness, webcolour(colour));
02515     }
02516     
02517     /*! function. border
02518         desc.
02519             Draw a border sized w,h at x,y of a thickness
02520     */
02521     void  border(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Ogre::Real thickness, const Ogre::ColourValue& northColour, const Ogre::ColourValue& eastColour, const Ogre::ColourValue& southColour, const Ogre::ColourValue& westColour);
02522     
02523     /*! function. border
02524         desc.
02525             Draw a border sized w,h at x,y of a thickness
02526     */
02527     void  border(Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, Ogre::Real thickness, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& northColour, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& eastColour, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& southColour, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& westColour)
02528     {
02529      border(x,y,w,h,thickness, webcolour(northColour), webcolour(eastColour), webcolour(southColour), webcolour(westColour));
02530     }
02531     
02532     /*! function. glyph
02533         desc.
02534             Draw a glpyh
02535     */
02536     void  glyph(Ogre::uint glyphDataIndex, Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, unsigned char character, const Ogre::ColourValue& colour);
02537     
02538     /*! function. glyph
02539         desc.
02540             Draw a glyph with a custom size.
02541     */
02542     void  glyph(Ogre::uint glyphDataIndex, Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, unsigned char character, const Ogre::ColourValue& colour);
02543     
02544     /*! function. glyph
02545         desc.
02546             Draw a glpyh
02547     */
02548     void  glyph(Ogre::uint glyphDataIndex, Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, unsigned char character, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& colour)
02549     {
02550      glyph(glyphDataIndex,x,y,character, webcolour(colour));
02551     }
02552     
02553     /*! function. glyph
02554         desc.
02555             Draw a glyph with a custom size.
02556     */
02557     void  glyph(Ogre::uint glyphDataIndex, Ogre::Real x, Ogre::Real y, Ogre::Real w, Ogre::Real h, unsigned char character, const Gorilla::Colours::Colour& colour)
02558     {
02559      glyph(glyphDataIndex, x,y,w,h, character, webcolour(colour));
02560     }
02561     
02562     /*! function. end
02563         desc.
02564             Stop drawing and calculate vertices.
02565     */
02566     void  end();
02567 
02568     void SetVisible(bool Vis)
02569     {
02570      if (mVisible == Vis)
02571       return;
02572      mVisible = Vis;
02573      mDirty = true;
02574      mLayer->_markDirty();
02575     }
02576 
02577     bool IsVisible() const
02578     {
02579      return mVisible;
02580     }
02581 
02582     void Show()
02583     {
02584      if (mVisible)
02585       return;
02586      mVisible = true;
02587      mDirty = true;
02588      mLayer->_markDirty();
02589     }
02590 
02591     void Hide()
02592     {
02593      if (!mVisible)
02594       return;
02595      mVisible = false;
02596      mDirty = true;
02597      mLayer->_markDirty();
02598     }
02599 
02600     void  RenderPriority(Gorilla::RenderPriority Priority)
02601     {
02602      mPriority = Priority;
02603     }
02604 
02605     Gorilla::RenderPriority RenderPriority()
02606     {
02607      return mPriority;
02608     }
02609 
02610     void  _redraw();
02611     
02612    protected:
02613     
02614     QuadList(Layer*);
02615     
02616     ~QuadList() {}
02617     
02618     struct Quad
02619     {
02620      Ogre::Vector2        mPosition[4];
02621      Ogre::Vector2        mUV[4];
02622      Ogre::ColourValue    mColour[4];
02623     };
02624     
02625     Ogre::Vector2         mWhiteUV;
02626     Layer*                mLayer;
02627     buffer<Quad>          mQuads;
02628     buffer<Vertex>        mVertices;
02629     bool                  mDirty;
02630     bool                  mVisible;
02631     Gorilla::RenderPriority mPriority;
02632 
02633   };
02634   
02635   /* class. Caption
02636      desc.
02637          A single line piece of text
02638   */
02639   class Caption : public Ogre::GeneralAllocatedObject
02640   {
02641     
02642    friend class Layer;
02643    
02644    public:
02645     
02646     /*! function. font
02647         desc.
02648             Changes the font to a different Glyph index.
02649         note.
02650              If the font index does not exist, an exception may be thrown.
02651     */
02652     void font(size_t font_index)
02653     {
02654      mGlyphData      = mLayer->_getGlyphData(font_index);
02655      if (mGlyphData == 0)
02656      {
02657        mDirty        = false;
02658    #if GORILLA_USES_EXCEPTIONS == 1
02659        OGRE_EXCEPT( Ogre::Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "Glyph data not found", __FUNC__ );
02660    #else
02661        return;
02662    #endif
02663      }
02664      mDirty = true;
02665      mLayer->_markDirty();
02666     }
02667     /*! function. intersects
02668         desc.
02669             Does a set of coordinates lie within this caption?
02670     */
02671     inline bool intersects(const Ogre::Vector2& coordinates) const
02672     {
02673      return ((coordinates.x >= mLeft && coordinates.x <= mLeft + mWidth) && (coordinates.y >= mTop && coordinates.y <= mTop + mHeight));
02674     }
02675     
02676     /*! function. top
02677         desc.
02678             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02679     */
02680     Ogre::Real  left() const
02681     {
02682      return mLeft;
02683     }
02684 
02685     /*! function. top
02686         desc.
02687             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02688         note.
02689              If the TextAlignment is Right Aligned, then this will be the right-side of the last character drawn (with in width limits).
02690              If the TextAlignment is Centre Aligned, then this will be the center of the drawn text drawn (with in width limits).
02691     */
02692     void  left(const Ogre::Real& left)
02693     {
02694      mLeft = left;
02695      mDirty = true;
02696      mLayer->_markDirty();
02697     }
02698 
02699     /*! function. top
02700         desc.
02701             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02702     */
02703     Ogre::Real  top() const
02704     {
02705      return mTop;
02706     }
02707 
02708     /*! function. top
02709         desc.
02710             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02711     */
02712     void  top(const Ogre::Real& top)
02713     {
02714      mTop = top;
02715      mDirty = true;
02716      mLayer->_markDirty();
02717     }
02718     
02719     /*! function. size
02720         desc.
02721             Set the maximum width and height of the text can draw into.
02722     */
02723     void size(const Ogre::Real& width, const Ogre::Real& height)
02724     {
02725      mWidth = width;
02726      mHeight = height;
02727      mDirty = true;
02728      mLayer->_markDirty();
02729     }
02730 
02731     /*! function. width
02732         desc.
02733             Get the maximum width of the text can draw into.
02734     */
02735     Ogre::Real width() const
02736     {
02737      return mWidth;
02738     }
02739     
02740     /*! function. width
02741         desc.
02742             Set the maximum width of the text can draw into.
02743     */
02744     void  width(const Ogre::Real& width)
02745     {
02746      mWidth = width;
02747      mDirty = true;
02748      mLayer->_markDirty();
02749     }
02750     
02751     /*! function. height
02752         desc.
02753             Get the maximum height of the text can draw into.
02754     */
02755     Ogre::Real height() const
02756     {
02757      return mHeight;
02758     }
02759     
02760     /*! function. height
02761         desc.
02762             Set the maximum height of the text can draw into.
02763     */
02764     void  height(const Ogre::Real& height)
02765     {
02766      mHeight = height;
02767      mDirty = true;
02768      mLayer->_markDirty();
02769     }
02770     
02771     /*! function. caption
02772         desc.
02773             Get the text indented to show.
02774     */
02775     Ogre::String  text() const
02776     {
02777      return mText;
02778     }
02779     
02780     /*! function. alignment
02781         desc.
02782             Set the text to show.
02783     */
02784     void  text(const Ogre::String& text)
02785     {
02786      mText = text;
02787      mDirty = true;
02788      mLayer->_markDirty();
02789     }
02790     
02791     /*! function. alignment
02792         desc.
02793             Get the alignment of text.
02794     */
02795     TextAlignment align() const
02796     {
02797      return mAlignment;
02798     }
02799     
02800     /*! function. alignment
02801         desc.
02802             Set the alignment of text.
02803     */
02804     void  align(const TextAlignment& alignment)
02805     {
02806      mAlignment = alignment;
02807      mDirty = true;
02808      mLayer->_markDirty();
02809     }
02810     
02811     /*! function. alignment
02812         desc.
02813             Get the vertical alignment of text.
02814     */
02815     VerticalAlignment vertical_align() const
02816     {
02817      return mVerticalAlign;
02818     }
02819     
02820     /*! function. vertical_align
02821         desc.
02822             Set the vertical alignment of text.
02823     */
02824     void  vertical_align(const VerticalAlignment& alignment)
02825     {
02826      mVerticalAlign = alignment;
02827      mDirty = true;
02828      mLayer->_markDirty();
02829     }
02830     
02831     /*! function. clipped_left_index
02832         desc.
02833             Get the index (character position), of the first character that could not be drawn due to the limits
02834             of the width of the text, to the left.
02835         return.
02836             size_t -- The index if the first clipped character, or std::string::npos if there was no clipping and
02837                       the text was drawn fully within the given space.
02838     */
02839     size_t  clipped_left_index() const
02840     {
02841      return mClippedLeftIndex;
02842     }
02843     
02844     /*! function. clipped_right_index
02845         desc.
02846             Get the index (character position), of the first character that could not be drawn due to the limits
02847             of the width of the text, to the right.
02848         return.
02849             size_t -- The index if the first clipped character, or std::string::npos if there was no clipping and
02850                       the text was drawn fully within the given space.
02851     */
02852     size_t  clipped_right_index() const
02853     {
02854      return mClippedRightIndex;
02855     }
02856     
02857     /*! function. colour
02858         desc.
02859             Get the text colour.
02860     */
02861     Ogre::ColourValue  colour() const
02862     {
02863      return mColour;
02864     }
02865     
02866     /*! function. colour
02867         desc.
02868             Set the text colour.
02869     */
02870     void  colour(const Ogre::ColourValue& colour)
02871     {
02872      mColour = colour;
02873      mDirty = true;
02874      mLayer->_markDirty();
02875     }
02876     
02877     /*! function. colour
02878         desc.
02879             Set the text colour.
02880     */
02881     void  colour(Gorilla::Colours::Colour colour)
